sn56.52:1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanāni āyāmena, paññāsayojanāni vitthārena, paññāsayojanāni ubbedhena, puṇṇā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
sn56.52:1.4: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—yaṃ vā kusaggena ubbhataṃ, yaṃ vā pokkharaṇiyā udakan”ti?
sn56.52:1.5: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṃ, yadidaṃ—pokkharaṇiyā udakaṃ; appamattakaṃ kusaggena udakaṃ ubbhataṃ.
sn56.52:1.6: Saṅkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti pokkharaṇiyā udakaṃ upanidhāya kusaggena udakaṃ ubbhatan”ti.
